item.title: Bradenton homicide victim is identified
item.description: The woman had 'significant and serious injuries' that were not caused by a traffic crash, police said.

item.title: Marion County sheriff massive search was caused by a hoax
item.description: Marion County sheriff massive search was caused by a hoax

item.title: Newsletter aims to connect dots behind headlines
Bending the Arc application period opens
Bending the Arc: Students experience history on spring beak
Cortez man claims ‘Stand Your Ground’ defense in driveway shootout
item.description: Keven Anderson says he was threatened with death and confronted by armed men on his property.

item.title: Threat to Venice synagogue was a hoax, police say
item.description: Venice Police were notified that the JCC received phone calls threatening to 'kill everyone.'

item.title: Manatee school district, teachers’ union reach tentative deal for 2025-26 school year
item.description: The new pact will be reviewed by teachers and paraprofessionals, and then the School Board.

item.title: ‘Super speeder’ caught doing 88 mph on Ringling Causeway, police say
item.description: Police did not release the drivers’ name but noted it was 53 mph over the posted limit.

item.title: Sarasota priest named to governing board of Anglican embassy to the Vatican
item.description: Church of the Redeemer is part of the Episcopal Diocese of Southwest Florida.

item.title: Bid approved for Anna Maria City Pier rebuild
item.description: The total estimated cost now sits between $6.2 million to $6.9 million.

item.title: Tampa Bay Rays sale officially completed
item.description: According to the Major League Baseball (MLB) website, the sale of the Tampa Bay Rays has been completed.

item.title: Kelsey Fisher excelling on the volleyball court despite injury setbacks
item.description: She’s a senior and one of the captains for the varsity volleyball team.

item.title: Venice Fishing Pier fully reopens after several years of hurricane damage
item.description: The total cost for the reconstruction was more than $400,000.

item.title: Imelda becomes 4th hurricane of season
item.description: Imelda is finally pushing away from Florida as it makes a bee line toward Bermuda.
